post: Thank you Gail and Stephen. I’ve ordered the book and will read it. But for now, I have a hard time thinking that there is much to this who tallit idea..
title: New Shroud of Turin book by John N. Lupia

author: episcopalian
post: William, there is no basis whatsoever for this claim. This is old news. Even Jull in his latest defense of the carbon dating doesn’t make this unsubstantiated claim. It is like saying the Joe Nickell didn’t get his Ph D in English from the University of Kentucky. Of course he did. It is a silly claim..
title: Outstanding Response to Recent Carbon Dating Paper
